title: Zap
description: Ridley despises Christmas and wants nothing more than to hibernate in her house and ride out the holiday.But her s***heads have other plans. They're determined to show her the magic of twinkly lights, carols, tinsel, and snowmen built out of sand. Thankfully, a marvel with weather manipulation powers begins causing problems, and Maddox and the guys are tasked to handle it.They have to find this pretend Santa and make him stop the winter wonderland before it kills someone. Especially when they realize the snow and ice are something more than a Christmas prank.
author: Helene Gadot
